snippet: A record 7.2 million Americans 65 or older are working, either to supplement their retirement savings — in some cases diminished by the financial crisis — or to remain active.
abstract: Record 7.2 million Americans 65 or older are working, either to supplement their retirement savings or merely in an effort to remain active.
lead_paragraph: A record 7.2 million Americans 65 or older are working, either to supplement their retirement savings — in some cases diminished by the financial crisis — or to remain active.

headline.seo: For Many Reasons, Older Americans Remain at Work
headline.main: Working Late, by Choice or Not
headline.print_headline: Working Late, by Choice or Not
